fields.headline: Try the snow in Argentina
fields.bodyText: Ski touring holidays in Argentina are to become available for the first time through Niche Encounters (www.skiargentina.co.uk) which will offer mini-expeditions in four ski resorts next northern summer. Included are an ascent of Tronador mountain on the Chilean border or an exclusive off-piste journey from the resort of Bariloche in Patagonia, across the 'Cathedral' range to Lake Gutierrez, which takes you through bamboo forests.
